name: Foundation of Empire
description: Learn to construct buildings on your planets. Buildings are the backbone of your economy and military infrastructure.

story.briefing: Commander, your homeworld needs infrastructure to support your growing empire. Mining Stations extract vital minerals, Horticultural Stations grow food for your population, and Docking Bays allow spacecraft construction. Today, you will construct your first building.
story.objective: Construct a Mining Station on your homeworld to begin resource extraction.
story.victory: Outstanding, Commander! Your Mining Station is under construction. It will be operational in 3 turns, providing a steady flow of minerals and fuel for your empire.

tutorialSteps.text: First, select your homeworld by clicking on it. You'll need to access its construction options.
The Planet Info Panel is now open. Click the 'Build' button to access the construction menu.
This is the Build Menu. It shows all available structures, their costs, and construction times. Buildings that you cannot afford appear grayed out.
Click on 'Mining Station' to begin construction. It costs 8,000 Credits, 2,000 Minerals, and 1,000 Fuel, and takes 3 turns to complete.
Construction has begun! Notice the 'Under Construction' section in your Planet Info Panel showing progress. The building will complete in 3 turns.
To advance time and complete construction, you would press SPACE to end your turn. For now, you've learned the essential building process!

clickByClickRecipe.title: Building a Structure - Step by Step

steps.instruction: Click on your blue homeworld planet
steps.expectedResult: Planet Info Panel opens on the right side of the screen

steps.instruction: Click the 'Build' button in the Actions section of the Planet Info Panel
steps.expectedResult: Build Menu panel appears in the center of the screen

steps.instruction: Look at the available buildings: Mining Station, Horticultural Station, Docking Bay, Orbital Defense, Surface Platform
steps.expectedResult: Each building shows name, description, cost (Credits, Minerals, Fuel), and construction time

steps.instruction: Compare the costs to your resources shown in the top-right Resource HUD
steps.expectedResult: Affordable buildings have white text; unaffordable ones are grayed out with red cost text

steps.instruction: Click on the Mining Station building entry
steps.expectedResult: Button highlights on hover, then construction begins on click

steps.instruction: Check the Planet Info Panel for the Construction section
steps.expectedResult: Shows 'Under Construction: Mining Station' with progress bar and 'Completes in: 3 turns'

steps.instruction: Check the Resource HUD in the top-right corner
steps.expectedResult: Resources have decreased by the building cost (8,000 Cr, 2,000 Min, 1,000 Fuel)

steps.instruction: The menu closes automatically after selecting a building, or click X to close manually
steps.expectedResult: Build Menu closes, Planet Info Panel remains visible

tips: Only one building can be constructed at a time on each planet
Buildings complete at the start of the income phase
A notification will appear when construction completes
Check planet type for bonuses: Volcanic planets produce 5x minerals!
